Posts.EditableText:
It isn't like trying to paste a picture into notepad..

Actually it IS quite easy to do - all Alex has to do is save what's in Window's clipboard, copy the picture, paste it into the rich text box, and then put the original stuff back into the clipboard - I did it that way once or twice, much easier than turning the picture into a bit-pattern and loading it into the richtext box that way (which is the only other way AFAIK).

- But he's moving to HTML IIRC and that might be much easier - allowing for moving text, more text effects and even pictures in frames - allowing a good deal of control over presentation.
Posts.HTML:

- But he's moving to HTML IIRC and that might be much easier - allowing for moving text, more text effects and even pictures in frames - allowing a good deal of control over presentation.
